bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Terminology for Power and Distribution Transformers
IEEE Draft Standard for Terminology for Power and Distribution Transformers
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Unapproved Draft Std PC57.12.80/D3, Mar 2009

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This 1 standard is a compilation of terminology and definitions related to electric power and distribution transformers and associated apparatus. It also includes similar terminology relating to power systems and insulation which is commonly involved in transformer technology.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
